name: LinkUpConferenceShow
content: LinkUpConferenceShow (LUCS) is a digital networking conference that merges the incredibly dynamic worlds of tech and comedy to provide informative and personalized networking opportunities designed to help executives, entrepreneurs, business leaders and tech professionals grow and scale their businesses. Buy tickets >> https://bit.ly/2DpA1zn Building a business is more than just strategy and development—it’s about making your story stand out and finding partners you can trust. LUCS believes that laughs lead to lasting connections and that networking should be stress free and focused. Our team takes care of the groundwork, so you can focus on what matters most—making meaningful connections. LUCS is the tech conference that combines Silicon Valley insights with New York’s nonstop energy to bring the technology community a totally new virtual experience designed to inspire, engage and entertain. LinkUpConferenceShow. A tech conference with a sense of humor.
